business.headline: OECD cuts global growth forecast citing trade war risksThe OECD has reduced its global growth forecast to 2.9% for 2025 and 2026, attributing the slowdown to heightened trade tensions.

Credit score made easy: Check it, fix it, boost itYour credit score is mostly shaped by how timely you are with payments, missing even one EMI or credit card due can bring it down.  A score of 750 or above is considered good by most banks and lending companies.

Sensex closes 636 points lower, Nifty below 24,600; Adani Ports down 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 636.24 points to close at 80,737.51, while the NSE Nifty50 fell by 174.10 points to end at 24,542.

Smallcap stocks are back in action again. Should you ride the wave?Since the market's low in February 2025, the Nifty50 index has risen by 12%. But the real jump has been in the mid and smallcap space. The midcap index has gone up by 20%, and the smallcap index has climbed 22% during the same period.

Sensex tumbles 700 points: What's behind today's stock market decline?The BSE Sensex was trading 740.82 points lower at 80,632.93 at around 1:13 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 fell 187.65 points to 24,528.95. All the other Nifty sectoral indices also fell as volatility rose during the session.

Own property in India? Why you must fix any paperwork issues nowIn fact, for years, the biggest property scam in India has been when someone who isn't the real owner sells a property. The buyer, after paying a huge amount, later finds out they were cheated, and the actual owner was someone else all along.

ITR filing made easy: Here's a simple step-by-step guide to file income tax returnBefore starting your income tax return, ensure you have key documents in hand. These include Form 16 from your employer, Form 26AS, the Annual Information Statement (AIS) and Tax Information Statement (TIS) from the income tax portal, and your bank statements.

India's GDP growth may decline to 6.2% in FY26, says NomuraThe assessment, published in a research note on Monday, comes amid what the brokerage describes as a growing "divergence" between headline indicators like GST collections and other key economic metrics such as automobile sales and bank credit growth.

Prostarm Info Systems shares make strong D-Street debut; list at 19% premiumProstarm Info Systems share price: The stock listed at Rs 125 on the BSE, which was 19.04% higher than its issue price of Rs 105. On the NSE, the stock opened at Rs 120, marking a 14.28% premium over its issue price.
Ola Electric shares tumble over 6% today. Here's whyBy 10:15 am, the stock was trading at Rs 50.52, down 5.9%, after reports of a large equity transaction rattled investors.

Yes Bank shares fall 8% after 3 sessions of gain. Here's whyYes Bank's shares fell 7.95% to touch a low of Rs 21.43. This was a huge change from the recent trend, as the stock had risen 8.4% in the previous session and was gaining for three days in a row.

Microsoft cuts over 300 jobs in fresh round of layoffs: ReportThe layoffs come just weeks after the company executed its biggest workforce reduction in recent years, signalling a deeper shift across the industry as artificial intelligence takes center stage.

Adani Ports, Adani Enterprises: Why are Adani Group shares in focus today?As of 9:41 am, both Adani Ports and Adani Enterprises were the top losers on the NSE Nifty50, down 1.5% each. Other companies in the Adani portfolio also saw marginal declines in early trade.

NSE shares surge in unlisted market amid IPO buzz. Here's what analysts sayWith over one lakh retail shareholders, a record for any unlisted Indian company, NSE has become a hotspot in the grey market. But analysts tracking the unlisted space suggest the rally may not be over just yet.
Sensex down 150 points, Nifty below 24,700; Adani Ports falls 3%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 226.44 points to 81,147.31, while the NSE Nifty50 fell by 45.05 points to 24,671.55 as of 9:29 am.

Sensex, Nifty today: Will stock market open higher to break recent downtrend?As of 8:15 am, Gift Nifty futures were trading at 24,845.5, showing a higher start compared to Nifty50's Monday close of 24,716.6.

Prostarm Info Systems IPO listing: Will it make strong market debut? Check GMPThe listing of Prostarm Info Systems comes at a time when recent mainboard IPOs have not performed very well on debut. Bidding was open from May 27 to May 29, 2025, and saw a total subscription of 96.68 times.

Stocks to watch on June 3: ITC, HCLTech, Biocon, Prostarm Info SystemsThe markets had a shaky start to the week with the Sensex falling over 700 points in early trade, but later recovered to end flat.

Trade deal with India in not-too-distant future: US Commerce SecretaryA trade deal between India and the United States could be finalised soon, as negotiations gain momentum following reciprocal tariff tensions, with US Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick expressing optimism that both sides have found common ground.

Uber delivery chief steps down after 13 Years; Andrew Macdonald named COOAs senior vice president of Uber's delivery unit, Pierre-Dimitri Gore-Coty oversaw the company's Uber Eats business as well as grocery and other on-demand delivery offerings, and is credited with steering the division through the COVID-19 pandemic.

Adani faces US scrutiny over Iran LPG 'links', denies role, says unaware of probeGautam Adani's firms are under scrutiny from US prosecutors for reportedly importing Iranian LPG into India through Mundra port. A spokesperson denied the company's involvement and said it was not aware of such a probe.

Rs 1 crore in 5 years: Check this guide for 40-year-olds earning Rs 2.5 lakh/monthIf you're earning Rs 2.5 lakh a month, building a corpus of Rs 1 crore in just five years may sound ambitious, but it's certainly achievable with the right planning, discipline, and smart investments.
India likely to become a $30 trillion economy by 2047, says Amitabh KantAt present, India's economy is valued at around $4 trillion. It recently became the fourth largest economy in the world.

Elon Musk's Tesla not interested in manufacturing cars in India: Union MinisterThe Union Minister said that Tesla is not expected to begin manufacturing vehicles in India in the near future. He mentioned that the company is currently interested only in opening showrooms in the country.
Sensex closes 77 points lower, Nifty below 24,700; Adani Ports gains 2%The S&P BSE Sensex was down by 77.26 points to close at 81,373.75, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 34.10 points to end at 24,716.60.

EPFO extends UAN-Aadhaar linking deadline for ELI scheme to June 30. Check stepsAs per a recent circular issued by the EPFO, the new last date to activate your UAN and link your Aadhaar-linked bank account is June 30, 2025. This deadline has already been pushed back several times, giving employees extra time to complete the process.

Reliance Power shares surge 8% today, 23% in last week. Should you buy?Reliance Power share price: Over the last six months, it has gone up by 59.92%. The stock has more than doubled in a year with a 141.40% rise. Over the last five years, the rise has been massive; 2,602.61%.

Living paycheck to paycheck: Analyst says India has worst family financial planningAn analyst said that in 2025 we need to teach kids not just how to earn money but how to manage it. He pointed out a common but dangerous mindset, the one with no room for budgeting, risk awareness, or financial learning.

RBI MPC: 25 bps rate cut on the cards? Here's all you need to knowSo far in 2025, the RBI has already cut the repo rate twice, once in February and then in April, by 25 bps each time. These cuts brought the key lending rate down to 6%.

NPS pensioners to get more benefits under Unified Pension Scheme. Details hereEligible NPS retirees can either get a one-time payment based on their last drawn Basic Pay and Dearness Allowance (DA) for every six months of service, or receive a monthly top-up if their current pension is less than what they'd get under UPS with Dearness Relief.

Leela Hotels share price: Stock lists at 7% discount on Dalal StreetThe company's stock opened at Rs 406 on the NSE, which is Rs 29 below the issue price of Rs 435. On the BSE, it opened slightly higher at Rs 406.50, still lower by Rs 28.50, or about 6.55%.

Sensex tumbles 700 points. Why is stock market falling despite strong GDP growth?The BSE Sensex was down 732.71 points to 80,718.30 around 9:25 am, while the NSE Nifty50 traded 197.45 points lower at 24,553.25. Most of the broader market indices also fell sharply amid a surge in volatility.

Leela Hotels vs Aegis Vopak listing: Which IPO will make stronger market debut?Leela Hotels and Aegis Vopak had their initial public offerings (IPOs) open for subscription from May 26 to May 28. While both IPOs were fully subscribed, they did not see very high demand during the bidding period.
Sensex, Nifty open lower as IT, metal stocks drag market despite good GDP dataThe S&P BSE Sensex declined 723 points to 80,728.03, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 191 points to 24,559.95 as of 9:25 am.

Stock market opening: Will Sensex, Nifty rally today after GDP numbers?India's economy grew by 7.4% in the January-March quarter, surprising many analysts. The growth was mainly driven by strong activity in the construction and manufacturing sectors.

Stocks to watch on June 2: IndiGo, Nykaa, Leela Hotels, Tata Motors, BPCLStocks such as Apollo Hospitals, IndiGo, Tata Motors, BPCL, Leela Hotels, and Aegis Vopak Terminals are expected to be in the spotlight, driven by recent news updates and their fourth-quarter earnings announcements.

Pankaj Tripathi joins Hyundai Motor India as brand ambassadorPankaj Tripathi is known for his roles in films and web series where he often plays characters that are relatable and grounded. Hyundai said this quality made him the right choice to represent the brand.

Air India in talks for another mega aircraft deal with Airbus, Boeing: SourcesThe plane orders come at a time when aircraft manufacturers are scrambling with supply chain issues leading to severe delays in aircraft delivery and a looming jet shortage.

Air India to move jet maintenance work from Turkey firm amid diplomatic tensionsAgainst the backdrop of Turkiye backing Pakistan and condemning India's strikes on terror camps in the neighbouring country in May, aviation security watchdog BCAS, on May 15, revoked the security clearance for Turkish company Celebi Airport Services India Pvt Ltd in the "interest of national security".

Fungus on food, expired goods: Zepto's Dharavi licence suspended over lapsesThe action against Zepto was taken after an inspection revealed fungal growth on food items, expired products, and unhygienic storage conditions.

entertainment.headline: Siddharth Nigam on being replaced by Aaman Devgan in Azaad: Waited an entire yearActor Siddharth Nigam recently opened up on being replaced by Ajay Devgn's nephew Aaman Devgan in 'Azaad.' His mother recalled their shocking reaction after finding out Aaman was playing the lead in the period drama.

Pankaj Tripathi on long working hours amid Deepika-Sandeep Vanga's Spirit rowActor Pankaj Tripathi talked about fixed work hours in films, saying it's important to set limits. He believes saying "no" politely is necessary to maintain a healthy balance.

Nagarjuna invites Chandrababu Naidu to son Akhil Akkineni-Zainab's weddingActor Nagarjuna met Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister N Chandrababu Naidu to invite him to his son Akhil Akkineni's wedding with Zainab Ravdjee on June 6.

Good Boy Cast Exclusive: Park Bo Gum, Kim So Hyun, Lee Sang Yi on Bollywood, India, their playlistPark Bo Gum, Kim So Hyun, Lee Sang Yi, Heo Seong Tae and Tae Won Seo get real in this exclusive interview with Bhavna Agarwal on all things Good Boy—their action-packed K-drama that's already winning hearts, premiering on Prime Video in India.

Avantika Malik on divorce with Imran Khan: Was the worst thing I had to go throughActor Imran Khan's ex-wife Avantika Malik recently spoke about their painful separation. The couple ended their eight-year marriage in 2019.

Paresh Rawal might be comedy king, but let's discuss when he was villain supremeBefore he became everyone's favourite Baburao Ganpatrao Apte, Paresh Rawal was one of Bollywood's most chilling and realistic villains. It's time to revisit his powerful negative roles that showed his true range long before he wore the crown of a comedy king.

Actor Parvathy slams Kerala government's inaction on Hema Committee's findingsActor Parvathy Thiruvothu criticised the Kerala government's delay in acting on the Hema Committee report, which was submitted over five years ago. She called out the lack of urgency, and pushed for overdue reforms in the Malayalam film industry.

Maalik teaser: Rajkummar Rao unleashes wrath on adversaries in violent thrillerThe teaser of Rajkummar Rao starrer 'Maalik' is out. The film debuts the actor in a dark, ruthless gangster avatar in the teaser.

Big B shares wedding pics on 52nd anniversary, expresses gratitude to fansAmitabh Bachchan shared unseen pictures from his wedding on his 52nd anniversary. The actor even posted a note and expressed his gratitude to fans.

Pankaj Tripathi denies being part of Kamal Haasan's Thug LifeActor Pankaj Tripathi has dismissed rumours of working with Kamal Haasan in 'Thug Life'. He stresses his preference for Hindi-speaking roles citing difficulty with other languages.

Aamir Khan on why Taare Zameen Par was personal: Junaid is dyslexicAamir Khan recently recalled his son Junaid's struggle with dyslexia. The actor spoke about how the story of 'Taare Zameen Par' (2007) resonated with him because of personal experiences.

Anees Bazmee reacts to Diljit Dosanjh's exit from No Entry 2Anees Bazmee clarified that Diljit Dosanjh's exit from 'No Entry 2' was due to scheduling conflicts. The director remained hopeful the issue would be resolved and filming would begin soon.

Priyanka Chopra shares adorable family moments with Malti and Nick Jonas. See picsPriyanka Chopra shared heartwarming family moments with Nick Jonas and their daughter Malti Marie on Instagram. The adorable photos gave fans a peek into their quality time together during her break from work.

Rana Naidu trailer: Rana Daggubati-Arjun Rampal lock horns in crime action-thrillerThe trailer of 'Rana Naidu' unveiled on June 3, brings back the world of crime, deceit, rivalry and human complexities. Arjun Rampal joins the sequel as Rana Daggubati's arch rival in the high-octane action-thriller series.

Ankita Lokhande recalls moments with Sushant Singh RajputAnkita Lokhande celebrated 16 years of 'Pavitra Rishta' with a special vlog, revisiting memories and honouring her late co-actor Sushant Singh Rajput. She shared how Sushant supported and taught her acting during their early days on the show.

Statement misunderstood: Kamal Haasan after court's rebuke on Kannada remarkActor Kamal Haasan has addressed a letter to the President of Karnataka Film Chamber of Commerce in the ongoing language row. In his statement, he stated that his words had been taken out of context.

Vishal Jethwa on Janhvi ignoring Ishaan at Cannes: She'd never be disrespectfulActor Vishal Jethwa has reacted to the viral Cannes Film Festival video which led to speculation about his co-stars Janhvi Kapoor and Ishaan Khatter's dynamics. He addressed claims about the alleged rift between the duo.

The Great Indian Kapil Show shoot kickstarts with Metro In Dino castKapil Sharma, along with his team, is all set to begin shooting for their first episode with the cast of the upcoming film, 'Metri In...Dino'. The film is set to release in theatres on July 4.

Blake Lively to drop emotional distress claims in Justin Baldoni lawsuitActor Blake Lively has requested to drop her emotional distress claims against Justin Baldoni amid their legal dispute. The move follows Baldoni's team seeking access to her medical records. The court will decide whether she must share mental health information or have the claims dismissed.

general news.headline: RCB vs PBKS Live: Priyansh, Prabhsimran cautious in Punjab's 191 chaseIPL 2025 Final, RCB (Bengaluru) vs PBKS (Punjab) Live Score: The Punjab Kings openers have got off to a great start in Ahmedabad. Priyansh and Prabhsimran are up and running, putting the pressure on the RCB bowlers.

6 fighter jets, 2 surveillance planes: Pak's losses in 4-day conflict with IndiaSources told India Today that technical analysis of operational data confirms that six fighter aircraft belonging to the Pakistan Air Force were shot down during the air battles.

Trump said Narender surrender, says Rahul Gandhi, gets branded Pak agent by BJPRahul Gandhi accused the BJP and RSS of bowing under pressure and contrasted their response with Congress leaders of the past. Reacting to his remarks, the BJP called him uncivilised and said Indians look at him as "an agent of Pakistan".

Will Shubhanshu Shukla speak to PM Modi from space?  Indian astronaut answersIndian Astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, set to launch on June 10, will become only the second Indian to travel to space after Rakesh Sharma and the first to visit the ISS.

No 'Thug Life' for Karnataka as no malice, no sorry, remains Kamal Haasan's standWhat did Kamal Haasan say? That Kannada language came out of Tamil. Why did he say so? Because he wanted to convey to Kannada actor Shiva Rajkumar, who was present in the audience, that Kannada and Tamil came from the same family.

KCR daughter's letter bomb fuels BRS flux: Will party fade into BJP?The BJP won't inherit any baggage associated with KCR's family rule. What it wants are BRS MLAs and grassroots leaders who can deliver votes and influence

Indian astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla's launch to Space Station postponedThe mission, part of Axiom Space's Ax-4 programme, was originally slated for May 29 and then rescheduled to June 8, but operational adjustments and ongoing quarantine protocols have now pushed the launch to June 10.

Virat Kohli played Test cricket: Fans slam RCB star for slow knock in finalIPL 2025 final: RCB star Virat Kohli came up with a restrained approach, not showing intent to find boundaries even in the powerplay. Fans questioned Kohli's approach as Bengaluru were scoring at less than 9 runs per over until the 14th over in Ahmedabad on Tuesday, June 3.

Why Sydney Sweeney's viral soap has the Internet gagged (and curious)Sydney Sweeney's latest soap bar, in collaboration with a men's skincare brand, has created a buzz. Not just because it is Sweeney endorsing it, but because it allegedly has her used bathwater infused in it.

Build memorial for Kanishka victims, gurdwara, Hindu group urge Canada govtTwo Indo-Canadian groups have urged the government of Canada to build a memorial to the 1985 Air India bombing victims in the province of British Colombia. The demand comes ahead of the 40th anniversary of the terror attack by Khalistanis, which remains the worst attack in Canadian history.

Spirit of India the real winner as war-paused IPL enters Final battleThe mini-war between India and Pakistan saw the popular IPL cricket tournament being halted for eight days. Ahead of the RCB vs PBKS IPL Final on Tuesday, a tribute to the armed forces, a string of deshbhakti songs and fluttering Indian flags made the spirit of India the real winner.

Kamal Haasan refuses to apologise, says won't release film in Karnataka for nowActor Kamal Haasan's counsel told the Karnataka High Court that Thug Life will not be released in the state for now, after the court questioned his lack of apology over remarks on Kannada's origins.

Who is Sana Yousaf? The 17-year-old Pakistani influencer shot dead in IslamabadPakistani influencer Sana Yousaf, 17, was shot dead at her Islamabad home on Monday evening. Read on to know more about her.
Retail gets personal: How brands are fast learning what you wantAn abundance of choice has brought personalisation into vogue. The consumer's journey may start digitally but end at an offline store

Impeachment motion to be brought against Yashwant Varma in next Parliament sessionThis came after a report by the enquiry committee said that Justice Varma failed to provide an explanation of the source of the money and the allegations of misconduct were serious enough to seek his impeachment.

Why Pak had to end 48-hour strike plan in just 8 hours, top General revealsGeneral Chauhan detailed the events of May 10, stating that Pakistan had launched multiple coordinated attacks with the intent of bringing India to its knees within two days.

The Brahmaputra: Myth, majesty and politics of waterAssam Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma believes a reduction in the Brahmaputra's water by China could actually help the state control its recurring, destructive floods. But the Brahmaputra is a complicated river, difficult even for the Himalayas to tame.

Arrested influencer Sharmishta Panoli's lawyer, a Muslim, calls her good studentSpeaking to India Today TV on Monday, advocate Md Shamimuddin alleged procedural lapses in Sharmishta Panoli's arrest by the Kolkata Police.

Against our sanskar: BJP slams Rahul Gandhi over tribute to Indira with shoes onIn visuals circulated on social media, Rahul Gandhi can be seen walking up to a framed photograph of his grandmother Indira Gandhi and placing flowers while still wearing his shoes.

Pakistani dossier claims India hit more places. Propaganda?A dossier released by Pakistan, accessed by India Today, reveals India struck more places during Operation Sindoor that were not previously disclosed by Indian defence authorities.

Video: Thar rams man in Noida after fight, throws him into drainA man was grievously injured after being hit by a Thar vehicle in Uttar Pradesh's Noida. The incident reportedly followed a prior fight, after which the accused allegedly attempted to run the victim over with the vehicle.

The victim was thrown off the road and fell into a nearby drain. A video capturing the incident has gone viral on social media, prompting police to take immediate notice.

Authorities have registered a case and formed a special team to apprehend the accused. Investigation is currently underway.

Wajahat Khan, who filed Sharmishta Panoli FIR, has cops chasing him nowKolkata's Wajahat Khan, whose complaint led to the arrest of influencer Sharmistha Panoli, has gone missing amid a flurry of FIRs against him for offensive posts allegedly by him against Hindu deities and customs. With FIRs against him in three states and the Assam Police ready to travel to Bengal to arrest him, Khan might find himself in the eye of a storm he unwittingly stirred.

Dalit outrage in Tenali after Jagan Reddy's visit over alleged police brutalityYS Jagan Mohan Reddy's visit to Tenali triggered protests after a viral video showed police brutally beating three Dalit youths. The government defended the police while the YSRCP made sharp accusations.

One nation, one husband: Bhagwant Mann's remark on BJP's 'sindoor politics'Punjab Chief Minister Bhagwant Mann took swipes at the BJP and PM Modi for what he described as attempts to solicit votes in the name of 'sindoor'.

sports.headline: Virat Kohli stunned as Omarzai takes superb running catch to dismiss RCB starAfghanistan pacer Azmatullah Omarzai produced a stunning caught-and-bowled effort to dismiss Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) star Virat Kohli. The dismissal in the 15th over not only broke RCB's momentum but also left Kohli visibly stunned.

Fans questioned Kohli's approach as Bengaluru were scoring at less than 9 runs per over until the 14th over in Ahmedabad on Tuesday, June 3.

Spirit of India the real winner as war-paused IPL enters Final battleThe mini-war between India and Pakistan saw the popular IPL cricket tournament being halted for eight days. Ahead of the RCB vs PBKS IPL Final on Tuesday, a tribute to the armed forces, a string of deshbhakti songs and fluttering Indian flags made the spirit of India the real winner.

Iga Swiatek sets up blockbuster semi-final clash vs Aryna SabalenkaDefending Champion Iga Swiatek ousted Ukraine's Elina Svitolina 6-1, 7-5 on a windy day at the French Open on Tuesday to set up a semi-final clash against World No.1 Aryna Sabalenka.

RCB vs PBKS: Confident captains spar with words ahead of IPL 2025 finalIPL 2025 Final, RCB vs PBKS: Punjab Kings captain Shreyas Iyer and Royal Challengers Bengaluru skipper Rajat Patidar set the tone for the high-octane title clash with their words as they walked out for the toss at a packed Narendra Modi Stadium.

IPL 2025 Final: Phil Salt plays, Tim David out as RCB, PBKS name unchanged XIsPhil Salt has made the cut to play in the IPL 2025 final while Tim David's campaign for RCB has come to an end as both teams name unchanged XIs for the final in Ahmedabad on Tuesday, June 3.

Chris Gayle in turban: Who is the RCB legend backing in IPL 2025 final?IPL 2025 final: Chris Gayle showed mixed support for RCB and Punjab Kings in the IPL 2025 final. His colourful attire left fans guessing his true loyalty.

Shankar Mahadevan rocks musical tribute to armed forces ahead of IPL 2025 finalShankar Mahadevan paid a touching tribute to the Indian armed forces ahead of the IPL 2025 final in Ahmedabad on Tuesday, June 3. The tribute was organised by the BCCI to pay tribute to the armed forces for their brave work during Operation Sindhoor.

England players arrive on cycles; WI team bus delayed due to London trafficThe start of the third ODI at The Oval was delayed on Tuesday after the West Indies team bus was caught up in heavy London traffic. Some England players avoided the jam by arriving on hired Lime bikes.

IPL 2025 Final: Phil Salt plays, Tim David out as RCB, PBKS name unchanged XIsPhil Salt has made the cut to play in the IPL 2025 final while Tim David's campaign for RCB has come to an end as both teams name unchanged XIs for the final in Ahmedabad on Tuesday, June 3.

The tribute was organised by the BCCI to pay tribute to the armed forces for their brave work during Operation Sindhoor.

England players arrive on cycles; WI team bus delayed due to London trafficThe start of the third ODI at The Oval was delayed on Tuesday after the West Indies team bus was caught up in heavy London traffic. Some England players avoided the jam by arriving on hired Lime bikes.

Ambati Rayudu backs RCB: Time for great city of Bengaluru to win IPL 2025Former CSK batter Ambati Rayudu backed RCB in their 2025 IPL final against Punjab Kings. Bengaluru have made it to the finals thrice before, but have never brought the coveted trophy home.

RCB is my team: EX-UK PM Rishi Sunak reveals love for franchise ahead of IPL 2025 finalFormer British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak has openly admitted his love for RCB, saying that they are his team ahead of the IPL 2025 final against PBKS. RCB will be aiming for their first IPL title on Tuesday, June 3.

Aryna Sabalenka buries 2024 ghosts to qualify for semi-finalFrench Open 2025: Aryna Sabalenka made her way through to the semis of the women's singles at Roland Garros after beating Qinwen Zheng 7-6 (7-3), 6-3 on Tuesday.

AUS vs ENG: Ashes ticket sales hit record high as fans brave long queuesAUS vs ENG: Ashes 2025-26 is already breaking records as ticket sales skyrocket. With over 220,000 sold on Day 1, fans are braving long queues for what promises to be Australia's most electric cricket summer yet.

Real Madrid, United and Barcelona feature on Forbes' most valuable listAs PSG lift their first-ever Champions League trophy, Forbes reveals the world's most valuable football clubs in 2025, with Real Madrid and Manchester United still leading despite turbulent seasons on the pitch.

Virat Kohli to play BBL? Cricket Australia CEO opens up on possibilitiesCricket Australia (CA) CEO Todd Greenberg stated that the presence of world-class players like Virat Kohli helps attract larger crowds and drives higher TRPs and viewership.

Drake curse to hit RCB? Rapper bets on Bengaluru in IPL final vs PBKSCanadian rapper Drake has placed a massive Rs 6.4 crore bet on Royal Challengers Bengaluru ahead of the IPL final 2025. The superstition around the 'Drake Curse' adds intrigue to the high-stakes cricket showdown.

Can Punjab's uncapped superboys land the final blow?IPL 2025 Final, PBKS vs RCB: Prabhsimran Singh, Priyansh Arya, Nehal Wadhera, and Shashank Singh have chipped in with consistent performances, helping Punjab Kings qualify for the final for the first time in 11 years.

Can Punjab's uncapped superboys land the final blow?IPL 2025 Final, PBKS vs RCB: Prabhsimran Singh, Priyansh Arya, Nehal Wadhera, and Shashank Singh have chipped in with consistent performances, helping Punjab Kings qualify for the final for the first time in 11 years.

Indonesia Open: PV Sindhu enters R2, Lakshya Sen knocked outPV Sindhu triumphed over long-time rival Nozomi Okuhara to enter the second round of the Indonesia Open. Meanwhile, India's ace shuttler Lakshya Sen bowed out early.

French Open Day 10 LIVE: Swiatek in semi-final, Sabalenka beats ZhengFrench Open Day 10 Live Updates: Iga Swiatek defeated Elina Svitolina to storm into the semi-final of the women's singles event at Roland Garros.  Aryna Sabalenka qualified for the semis after beating Qinwen Zheng in the first quarterfinal match on Tuesday.

After PSG & Spurs, RCB vs PBKS could crown a season of stunning firstsThe IPL 2025 final between Royal Challengers Bengaluru and Punjab Kings could well become the latest chapter in a year defined by first-time champions — teams rewriting history after spending years on the wrong side of it.

RCB vs PBKS: Will Bengaluru miss 2 key players in the IPL Final?Royal Challengers Bengaluru got a welcome boost ahead of the IPL 2025 final. RCB shared a photo of Phil Salt arriving at the Narendra Modi Stadium after reports claimed the England opener had flown back home to be with his family for the birth of his child.

Can Virat Kohli improve his Knockout game as history beckons for RCB?Royal Challengers Bengaluru (RCB) star Virat Kohli is just one step away from achieving his long-standing dream of winning an IPL trophy. Over the years, he's given his sweat and blood in pursuit of his ultimate dream. However, nothing has been enough to change his destiny. As RCB march into another IPL final, Kohli has a great chance to take matters into his own hands and complete his fairy tale.

Pardeep Narwal retires after going unsold in Pro Kabaddi League auctionKabaddi star Pardeep Narwal confirmed his retirement after going unsold in the PKL 2025 auction. His next chapter focusses on coaching and nurturing future talent in kabaddi.

The RCB remontada: How bowling, Kohli non-dependence have them on brink of IPL titleOnce considered to be two of their main weak points, RCB's bowling and non-dependence on big names have guided the franchise to their fourth IPL final. Can these two factors turn out to be the reasons for their first championship win?

D Gukesh's classy reply to Magnus Carlsen potentially quitting classical chessLegendary Magnus Carlsen has said that he is contemplating his future in the classical chess format. Carlsen made his announcement after losing to D Gukesh in the Norway chess tournament.
